root: ^Ay, there ya go! Gettin' better and better, huh?
^Why do you gotta throw all the food at me? Why not just hand it to me?
^Ay, then it wouldn't be fresh, would it?
^How is flinging it at me making it "fresh"?
^It's tha quickest way to get it from table to tray to customer! Any dilly-dallyin' would ruin it!
^So... get that out to tha customer as soon as ya can!
^(Surely there's a better way than flinging it at my head...)
^(I take the food out to the customer, and go back to the kitchen to help Swatts clean up a bit.)
^Why do you gotta throw the food?! Just hand it to me normally?!
^Ay, but then it wouldn't be as fresh as it can be!
^How is throwing it at my head making it as fresh as it can be?!
^It's tha most optimal timing! Quickest way to get it to tha customer while stayin' fresh!
^Is it still "fresh" if half the ingredients are wrong?
^Aight aight, lemme fix it up. I'll take it out.
^(Chef Swatts makes the burger a bit better, and takes it out to the customer. After a minute, he comes back in looking a bit disgruntled...)
^I dunno what that lady's deal is. She actin' like she never seen a fly be a chef before!
^Back on Dipterra, I had a brotha, Tacho
^He an' I made do, with whatever we could find.
^We would go from spot to spot, gatherin' as much as we could an' stockpiling.
^Ya, some nights I couldn't eat. Why I'm mad grateful that I'm here now... But, anywho.
^One of tha nights we were out huntin' pretty late. And, well...
^A clan of spiders was out for a hunt. And ah, let's keep it simple and say that they sniffed out Tacho.
^So, I fled on to our hideaway.
^That sounds... Really rough. I'm so sorry...
^Well, I went back a few days later, see.
^Watched 'em from a distance 'til one of tha spiders was alone...
^Ya! Tricked 'em right into a pool of hot oil!
^(I'd say that's considered murder... But I doubt they have a concept of that in Dipterra... It seems like total anarchy.)
^Of course, that's when I took his Personal Portal Device!
^...Do you not go back at night?
^Why not go home though? Like, at all?
^Why would I? I ain't got no one there. It's a death trap, and there's barely any food at all compared to this haven!
^Far as I know, I reach nirvana! I won tha game! Why would I ever go back?

c-0: ^Honestly... It seems like you might be right.
^It seems like you struggled a lot, and you finally made it... I don't blame you for not wanting to ever go back.
^Ay, I knew ya'd get what I mean!
^There ain't no point in me goin' back when I made it here!
^I'd do the same, honestly. Some days, it feels like I just wanna escape from Earth and kick it here instead.
^Ay, you got viscious spiderfolk goin' around and massacring peeps back on Earth too?
^Well, no. But it certainly feels like it...
^Honestly, a lot of times I feel like probably how you felt. Although without the threat of being murdered on a daily basis. I wish I could just run away to a different world...
^It's more complicated than that... I can't just drop everything for myself.
^I have family, friends... I have more strings attached than you do.
^Ay, I see what ya mean... So really, tha Great Void is tha perfect world.
^There ain't no strings attached here. If ya from here, ya free to do whateva ya want!
^(Jeez... I hope I didn't come across as too depressing...)
^(Well, I can't dwell on it now. I got more cleaning to do...)
c-1: ^You mentioned that there's a whole bunch of other flyfolk in Dipterra. They all go through the same troubles you went through, right?
^Well... You defeated a spider, and even got its Portal Device.
^Why not help out the other flyfolk that are struggling because of the spiders? Some might be like how you used to be, on their own scavenging what they can.
^Ay, they all like that. Not a single insectica aside from them Spiders live in comfort.
^Even more to my point! You could... I dunno, make a difference or something. Help those in need, even if it seems like a lot.
^A small difference is still a difference, y'know?
^Ay... Ya make a point... Though I'd be riskin' my life... And I'd hafta make more food... And somehow get it past O'Ryan...
^It's something to think about, I guess.
^Ay, and think about it I will. Thank ya, Gracie.
^(I don't know if Swatts is genuine or not, but I hope he actually thinks of what I said...)
^(For now, I still got some cleaning to do.)
c-2: ^Y'know, you defeated a Spider, and even took its Portal Device...
^So you're the only one that's managed to kill a Spider...
^To the rest of the insectica, you'd probably be seen as a hero, right?
^So... Why not go back and claim that fame? You could rile up the insectica and start a revolution against the spiders!
^Yeah! You said that they're viscious, destructive, and kill indiscriminately. That sounds like a tyrannical, horrifying way to live... Constantly in fear of being killed by the Spiders...
^But you know how to defeat them! You have their Portal Device! You have the upper hand!
^You could rally the people behind you and fight for peace, and overthrow them!
^Ay, mayhaps... I dunno, that seems a bit above my grade, ya?
^Maybe, but like... Think about it. If you could get one by yourself, imagine the damage you could do if you all teamed up and fought together?
^...I think I see what ya mean.
^I dunno though, that's somethin' I gotta think about.
^(I really hope Swatts does the right thing here. The insectica seem to have been suffering for centuries--this could be their chance at freedom.)
^(But for now... I still have some more cleaning to do.)

Start: ^Ey yo, Graciana! Think ya can gimme some help real quick?
Sure: ^Good good! Get ovah here an' help me with this!
^I need ya help ASAP! Help me with this Blobster!
^(Going back to the kitchen with Chef Swatts, I see the strangest creature imaginable.)
^(A strange crustacean is in a bucket on the kitchen counter.)
^(Peeking inside, its shell is a bright pink color and almost seems soft.)
^(It only has one massive pincer, with a handful of smaller crab-like legs.)
^(Its eyes are massive, almost human-like. It's uncomfortable to look at...)
^Ya gotta help me kill this thing, undastand?
^Why not? Ya can totally do it!
^I don't doubt that I can do it, I just don't want to!
^Here, ya take the knife. Ya just pick it up and do one small lil cut at the bottom, and it'll die instantly.
^They don't even feel pain! They're like fish, they don't got nerves or whateva.
^(He points the handle of the knife at me to grab it...)

c-0: ^(I reluctantly grab the knife. As I pick up the Blobster, Swatts clasps his hands, bows his head, and whispers something under his breath.)
^(As told, I give the Blobster one small cut at the bottom. It instantly stops moving with no reaction.)
^Ay, there ya go! Here, put it in tha pot here!
^(I drop the Blobster in the pot of boiling water, and it begins to cook)
^I mean, yeah. But I never wanna do that again.
^Why couldn't you do it? Isn't that your job as Chef?
^Hah, true true. I just thought ya'd want the experience, ya know?
^Ya mentioned cooking ain't a strong point for ya. Wanted to help
^...I mean... I guess this helps? Although couldn't we start with like, grilled chicken or something?
^Hah! Well, that wouldn't be much a challenge then, would it?
^...Sure...? I think I get what you mean... Kinda...
^What was that thing you did, right before I cut it? It almost looked like you were praying...
c-1: ^Ahh, c'mon Graciana! It only takes one cut!
^(Swatts clasps two of his hands together, bows his head and closes his eyes, whispering something to himself.)
^(Then, in one swift motion, Swatts takes the Blobster in his hands and makes a cut at the bottom of it.)
^(It lets out one last gurgle before it becomes completely limp, as Swatts drops it in a pot of boiling water)
^No, absolutely not. The only thing I can kill are fl... uh...
^...Why did you even want *me* to do it? Aren't *you* the chef?
^Ehh, I just thought ya'd want the experience, ya know?
^Ya mentioned cooking ain't a strong point for ya. Thought this woulda helped ya.
^How would killing a weird alien lobster thing helped me cook?!
^It's part of tha process! Ya gotta be with tha food for every step of tha way!
^...Say, what was that thing you did? Before you cut it, it almost looked like you were praying.
c-2: ^(I reluctantly grab the knife, and pick up the Blobster.)
^(Chef Swatts clasps his hands together, bows his head, and whispers something under his breath.)
^(I toss the Blobster out the window!)
^(...It floats through the endless void... Staring back at me with those big eyes...)
^I wanted to help ya get better at cooking, but, ah, maybe ya ain't at Blobster level yet.
^That Blobster is gonna have one hell of a trip.
^What was that thing you did...? It almost looked like you were praying.

Next: ^Before ya prep any food, ya gotta give a quick lil thanks to tha way of tha food, for lettin' ya cook it.
^If ya don't, big beast in the sky would get upset, ya?
^Nah nah, I mean BIG beast. Bigger than O'Ryan.
^Ya, wayyy bigger than O'Ryan. On a whole other level, ya know?
^Ay, bigger than words can even say. Maybe one day, when ya realize the way of the food in ya blood.
^...I still don't know what any of that means...
^(It sounds like he just doesn't wanna tell me...)
^Just let it be, and it'll come to ya.
^I give my thanks to it, cause I'm now truly blessed.
^Well ya see, back in Dipterra them spider clans reaaally messed things up for us.
^Now that I'm here, in this wondaful Diner, I got all the food I could want and more!
^But in Dipterra we had next to nothin' at all, ya know. Nothin' but whatever berries we could find.

c-0: ^You mentioned them before... But what are the Spider Clans exactly?
^Ya, well, tha Spider Clans fully rule Dipterra. They ain't kind at all, ya know.
^In Dipterra, there's a buncha insectica just like me, ya? Includin' spiders.
^Them spiders are tha the most powerful insectica, physically speakin'.
^They at, how you say, top of the food chain? And us flyfolk are at tha bottom.
^They take and do whateva they want, and there ain't much for us to do about it, ya know?
^Yeah, I think I get what you mean...
^Has anyone ever tried to uh, do anything? Like, fight back at all?
^Well, ya know... I may have at some point got one of 'em good. But that was more in the "prime," ya?
^Ya... Somethin' like that. More like, ehh...
^Ay, ay, look at that! We got an order for a burger!
^Order up! Come help me out with this, ya?
c-1: ^...What do ya mean? Did I say "we"?
^Ya, well. Life in Dipterra is very full of danger. It ain't uncommon for most folk to, "pass on" every day.
^It's a miracle that I lived as long as I 'ave.
^I had a brotha, but one of the spider clans made him lunch, aha!
^Sorry? For what? Not like ya the one that ate him!
^That's just what happens in Dipterra, ain't no sweat.
^I guess I'm just not used to death being treated so... Casually?
^It's kind of a big deal on Earth, for the most part. We have whole ceremonies for when someone passes...
^Ya, we don't really have anything like that. Just an average day, haha!
^Besides, ain't nothin' to sweat about. I soon got revenge on tha spider that got my bro.
^Ay ay, look at that, order up for a burger!
^Graciana, come help me wit' this, ya?
c-2: ^What kind of berries? Anything like what you've shown me so far?
^I dunno why ya think it's so strange, though.
^We don't have vegetables that explode. Or really any kind of food that explodes.
^Ha, well we don't have human people where I'm from, ya?
^Yeah... I guess you got a point there.
^I'm still kind of adjusting to the whole... multiverse thing.
^It's pretty new to us... "Commoners." It was only made accessible to the public like, not even a year ago.
^Ay, it still ain't really "public" for us in Dipterra. Only them Spider Clans have access to tha fancy Personal Portal Devices.
^Oh, Personal Portal Devices? We only have access in specific transportation centers.
^Although I guess that's better than it being limited to a clan of viscous hunters...
^...Wait, then how did you get here?
^...Ay! Look at that, we got an order!
